content: We delivered revenues of $105.6 million in Q3, representing 79% growth year-on-year, and our GMV for Q3 totaled $621 million, growing 77% year-on-year. Our adjusted gross profit for the quarter was $43.8 million, representing a very strong growth of 92% year-on-year, outpacing our revenue growth, as we continue to pursue economies of scale benefits and realize COG synergies with Flow. As Amir already mentioned, our fast growth in GMV continued in Q3 as we generated $621 million of GMV, an increase of 77% year-over-year. In Q3, U.S. outbound revenue was up 184% year-over-year, driven by strong growth of the Global-e platform U.S. outbound business, coupled with the high share of U.S. outbound on the Borderfree platform. Sales and marketing expense, excluding Shopify warrants related amortization expenses, amortization of acquired intangibles and stock-based compensation was $9 million or 8.5% of revenue compared to $5.2 million or 8.8% of revenue in the same period last year.
